channel.title: My little story
channel.description:
Hello, and thank you for wanting to read my story. Well I am still working on it, so be nice :D ideas/fixes are welcome.
[u][b]A Little Walk[/b][/u]
Once upon a time... There was two kids walking around town. Their names were Ryan and Bryan. While they were walking , both of them noticed a very faint blue light. Ryan asked, "Hey Bryan, do you think we should check that out?" Bryan replies, "Ummm yeah, just to see..." So they started walking over toward the blue light. As they got closer, a noise started coming from no where. They looked at each other... but kept walking forward. As they neared the light, they noticed a small obect. "I wonder what that is" said Bryan. Ryan replied, "I don't know, lets go find out"
"Alright!", said Bryan. So when the boys walked even closer. The object started takeing shape in the boy's eyes. "OMG!!", yells Ryan. The boy's gasp in shock. The object appears to be a a gun. As they start stepping backwards, they notice the noise stopped. "Uhhhh", says Bryan. Ryan yells, "Yikes!!" Now running away, around the corner a guy dressed in black, stops them. "Well hello boys", the guy says. "UHH, Hi", reply the boys. "What you doing around here?", asks the guy. "Um... just takeing a little walk for some excersise.", Ryan repys. "Well, ok get lost! Before I call the cops", the guy yells.
Running away for their lives Ryan and Bryan don't even want to look back. As they are running Bryan starts thinking, I wonder what that guy was going there. He was also thinking about the gun, and the guy being dressed in black. "Should we go back, or go tell someone?", asks Ryan. "I think we should just wait for a little while" Bryan replies. So they sit down on the little brick wall, and wait. Waiting might have been a bad idea though.
While waiting, they hear some foot-steps coming at a quick pace. Nervous, the boys look at each other. "AHHHHH!", yell the boys. Running once again, search for a place to hide they think they have got away. But did they? :| Nope, when all of a sudden they look back just to make sure, and they notice the guy. "I wonder if he is running away or trying to find us.", says Bryan. Ryan replys, "I don't know but let's get out of here!" Now near their houses they start to walk. Making sure the guy isn't following they go inside Bryan's house. "Woah! That was a close one!", Ryan screams. "Yeah you got that right", Bryan says.
"Let's watch some television to get our mind off of things.", Ryan suggests. The boys start to head towards the living room. Walking past the kitchen Bryan notices his mom cutting some peppers for diner. Bryan starts to think, hmmm maybe I should tell my mom. So Bryan goes over to the kitchen, Ryan follows in concern. "Hey mom, what you doing?", Bryan asks. "Just getting diner ready.", she replies. "Ohh, that's cool.", Bryan says. "Yup!", she replys. Ryan looks at Bryan thinking, YOU BETTER NOT TELL HER! So now Ryan starts to get worried, but Bryan wasn't going to tell. He just wanted to see what's up. "Well we're going to watch some t.v.", Bryan says. "Okay, have fun.", she replies, still getting diner ready.
[b][u]Stopped Writing , if you want to write the rest. Just pm me the rest of it and I will post it here. Thanks[/u][/b]

item.title: My little story
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:6, topic:24420”][quote author=bryanc link=topic=37032.msg459853#msg459853 date=1163557980]
Alright , I write a paragraph or two a day. Since I have school But maybe I will write 2-4 from now on
[/quote]
It takes me about 3 minutes to write a descriptive, interesting paragraph. How long does it take you? Or is it that you just have that much homework?[/quote]

It took me 6 hours to write an essay on Weapons of Mass Destruction! 8 pages long! I just finished with it, I still have to study for 6 tests for tomorrow. I didn’t know high school would be so hard…

Read full topic

item.title: My little story
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

No I don’t do my homework lol ;D I amin middle school. I just don’t like reading or writing. So I don’t spend my time doing that. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: My little story
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

bryanc:

Alright , I write a paragraph or two a day. Since I have school But maybe I will write 2-4 from now on

It takes me about 3 minutes to write a descriptive, interesting paragraph. How long does it take you? Or is it that you just have that much homework?

bryanc:

He he yeah sorry and thanks

No problem, I hope you continue with your story. Refer to this thread if you need writing help.

item.title: My little story
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Great attempt! That is an OK introductionary paragraph.

[quote=“bryanc, post:1, topic:24420”]
Ryan asked Bryan, “Hey Bryan, you think we should check that out?” Bryan replies, “Ummm yeah, just to see…”[/quote]

Change it to - Ryan asked, “Hey Bryan, do you think we should check that out?”

They looked at each other... but kept walking toward the light.

Change it to - They looked at teach other… but kept walking forward.
Why? You used walking towards the light too much.

When they got there, they noticed a small object just lieing near the light.

Change it to - As they neared the light, they noticed a small obect.

"I wonder what it is" says Bryan. "I don't know, want to go look?" ryan replies.

Change it to - “I wonder what that is” said Bryan. Ryan replied, “I don’t know, lets go find out”
Why? Well Bryan will probably say “yeah lets go look” so you might as well says “lets go find out”.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Hello, and thank you for wanting to read my story. Well I am still working on it, so be nice ideas/fixes are welcome.

                                                                              [u][b]A Little Walk[/b][/u]

        Once upon a time... There was two kids walking around town. Their names were Ryan and Bryan. While they were walking , both of them noticed a very faint blue light. Ryan asked, "Hey Bryan, do you think we should check that out?" Bryan replies, "Ummm yeah, just to see..." So they started walking over toward the blue light. As they got closer, a noise started coming from no where. They looked at each other... but kept walking forward. As they neared the light, they noticed a small obect. "I wonder what that is" said Bryan. Ryan replied, "I don't know, lets go find out"

       "Alright!", said Bryan. So when the boys walked even closer. The object started takeing shape in the boy's eyes. "OMG!!", yells

Ryan. The boy’s gasp in shock. The object appears to be a a gun. As they start stepping backwards, they notice the noise stopped. “Uhhhh”, says Bryan. Ryan yells, “Yikes!!” Now running away, around the corner a guy dressed in black, stops them. “Well hello boys”, the guy says. “UHH, Hi”, reply the boys. “What you doing around here?”, asks the guy. “Um… just takeing a little walk for some excersise.”, Ryan repys. “Well, ok get lost! Before I call the cops”, the guy yells.

         Running away for their lives Ryan and Bryan don't even want to look back. As they are running Bryan starts thinking, I wonder what that guy was going there. He was also thinking about the gun, and the guy being dressed in black. "Should we go back, or go tell someone?", asks Ryan. "I think we should just wait for a little while" Bryan replies. So they sit down on the little brick wall, and wait. Waiting might have been a bad idea though.

        While waiting, they hear some foot-steps coming at a quick pace. Nervous, the boys look at each other. "AHHHHH!", yell the boys. Running once again, search for a place to hide they think they have got away. But did they?  :| Nope, when all of a sudden they look back just to make sure, and they notice the guy. "I wonder if he is running away or trying to find us.", says Bryan. Ryan replys, "I don't know but let's get out of here!" Now near their houses they start to walk. Making sure the guy isn't following they go inside Bryan's house. "Woah! That was a close one!", Ryan screams. "Yeah you got that right", Bryan says.

        "Let's watch some television to get our mind off of things.", Ryan suggests. The boys start to head towards the living room. Walking past the kitchen Bryan notices his mom cutting some peppers for diner. Bryan starts to think, hmmm maybe I should tell my mom. So Bryan goes over to the kitchen, Ryan follows in concern. "Hey mom, what you doing?", Bryan asks. "Just getting diner ready.", she replies. "Ohh, that's cool.", Bryan says. "Yup!", she replys. Ryan looks at Bryan thinking, YOU BETTER NOT TELL HER! So now Ryan starts to get worried, but Bryan wasn't going to tell. He just wanted to see what's up. "Well we're going to watch some t.v.", Bryan says. "Okay, have fun.", she replies, still getting diner ready.

Stopped Writing , if you want to write the rest. Just pm me the rest of it and I will post it here. Thanks
